sources.title: The Cowboy and the Bandit (1935) REX LEASE
sources.description:
Stars: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Blanche Mehaffey
Director: Al Herman

Wrongly accused as a horse thief, a cowboy is saved from a lynch mob by an outlaw gang that use their guns to bring justice to a territory betrayed by corrupt lawmen.

metadata.Plot: Bill travels to a new state after the outlaw Scarface saves him from a lynch mob. There he takes a job on the Barton ranch and joins in the fight against gang leader Larkin. Finding a wounded Scarface he helps him recover. Arrested by Larkin's stooge Sheriff, and with another lynch mob after him, he once again needs Scarface's help.
metadata.Actors: Rex Lease, Bobby Nelson, Blanche Mehaffey
